plot: A gold miner returns to his hometown to arrange marriages for his fellow miners. He discovers that his own sweetheart was murdered by a corrupt army officer, and he teams up with a rebel fighter to defeat him.
title: Shuang long tu hu
plot_es: A gold miner returns to his hometown to arrange marriages for his fellow miners. He discovers that his own sweetheart was murdered by a corrupt army officer, and he teams up with a rebel fighter to defeat him.
plot_en: A gold miner returns to his hometown to arrange marriages for his fellow miners. He discovers that his own sweetheart was murdered by a corrupt army officer, and he teams up with a rebel fighter to defeat him.
